item.title: The ABORTION HOLOCAUST and its Delusional Defenders ft. Live Actionâ€™s AJ Hurley [Open Mike with Michael Thiessen]
item.description:
OPEN MIKE w/Michael Thiessen ~ August 18, 2023
On this week's episode of OPEN MIKE, Dr. Thiessen is joined once again by Live Action's AJ Hurley to discuss the glaring injustice of abortion and all the silly, illogical justifications for the greatest holocaust of all time. 

Episode Resource: "Your Body, Your Problem" | Live Action: https://twitter.com/i/status/1674090632300867584; "Abortion Rights Are Pro-Choice Men's Rights" | Live Action: https://youtu.be/o950k2HffWw; https://liveaction.org;  https://www.liveaction.org/news/infant-bodies-infanticide-attempted-abortions/; https://www.breitbart.com/politics/2023/01/27/watch-pro-abortion-activists-scream-their-heads-off-at-pro-lifers-during-2023-womens-march/; https://endthekilling.ca.

JOIN US  ON Oct.31- Nov. 1 @ Spark Conference: https://www.sparkconferences.org/;

item.title: APPEAL DENIED!!! ft. Jacob Reaume: Supreme Court of Canada REFUSES Church Appeal [Open Mike with Michael Thiessen]
item.description:
OPEN MIKE w/Michael Thiessen ~ August 12, 2023
On this episode of Open Mike, Dr. Thiessen is joined by the Lead Pastor of Trinity Bible Chapel (Waterloo, ON), Jacob Reaume, to talk about the Supreme Court of Canada's recent refusal to hear their case concerning State tyranny during the COVID-19 pandemic. 

Episode Resources: "Supreme Court Will Not Hear Ontario Churches' Constitutional Challenge to COVID Restrictions" | Justice Centre for Constitutional Freedoms: https://www.jccf.ca/supreme-court-will-not-hear-ontario-churches-constitutional-challenge-to-covid-restrictions/;
